name: documentSolutionManifest
instanceNameFormat: Mightora Power Platform Solution Manifest Documentation Generator
description: Comprehensive documentation generator for Power Platform solution manifests. This task extracts and documents all information from the Solution.xml file including solution metadata, publisher details, root components, missing dependencies, and version information. Perfect for creating detailed solution documentation and tracking solution composition across environments.
author: mightoraio

inputs.name: solutionXmlPath
inputs.label: Solution.xml File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the Solution.xml file located in the src/Other/ folder of your unpacked solution.

inputs.name: outputLocation
inputs.label: Output Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where the generated Markdown documentation files will be stored. If this directory doesn't exist, the script will create it.

inputs.name: includeComponents
inputs.label: Include Component Details
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include detailed breakdown of all root components in the solution.

inputs.name: includeDependencies
inputs.label: Include Missing Dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include details about missing dependencies in the documentation.
